title: Elegant Pittsburgh Escape in the Heart of Downtown
description: Uncover an irresistible blend of sophistication and charm with a luxurious stay at the Kimpton Hotel Monaco Pittsburgh, an IHG Hotel. Indulge at The Commoner, where chef-crafted burgers and milkshakes beckon before ascending to the seasonal rooftop bar. When it's time to explore, find yourself within walking distance of Pittsburgh's greatest attractions, including PNC Park, Duquesne Incline and the Andy Warhol Museum.
